name: Project Svarta
description:
Game developed as a final project for the Digital Games Design course at the Polytechnic Institute of Bragança.

Storyline: The idea of multiple universes existing simultaneously and in parallel dimensions is very present in popular imagination, and what if it's not just imagination?

Authors:

Cleiton Moreira - Instagram: @kleyrowmoreirart

Luana Beatriz - Instagram: @itsluanabia
